descriptionHTML:
Deliver better lessons. The V1 Pro App is a flexible solution for Golf Instructors looking to capture, analyze, and deliver video lessons anywhere, anytime. Join the 6,000+ instructors around the world who teach with V1 Pro.

IMPORTANT: To use the V1 Pro app you must have an active Branded or Mobile Academy login. If you are a Branded Academy Instructor and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.


VIDEO LESSONS:
Create recorded video lessons with voice-over analysis, telestration, and dual video comparison
Access complete HD model swing library (New models added monthly)
Send recorded video lessons directly to students via text or email
Receive videos from students who use the V1 Golf App
Store student contact information and swing videos to track progress and communication

VIDEO CAPTURE & ANALYSIS TOOLS:
Import video from Gallery
Accelerate, trim, & edit videos
Playback in slow motion and frame-by-frame
Drawing tools to measure and highlight form
Angle measurement tool
Zoom in to see detail
Compare two videos in slow motion and frame-by-frame
Overlay two videos for more precise comparison
Unlimited cloud storage for videos and lessons
Flip videos to show right or left handed view
Share videos on social media and via email

TESTIMONIALS:
“V1 has been the key tool to what we do day in and day out for our lessons.” - John Webster, PGA Teaching Professional

“It is a relationship builder.” - Jimmy Tirone, PGA Teaching Professional
comments: It doesn't let me create an account. It gets into a loop
Too much I was really excited to download this app..once I did, I found out that I would need to create an account that costs $100mo just to use the app...disappointment
Great job! I've been waiting for the Android version of the pro app. Looks great and working well on my phone and Nexus 7!
